name: Ambulation
title: Ambulation
description:
Used to identify patients who have demonstrated the ability to walk at least one step.

NOTE:  VALUE SET UNDER DEVELOPMENT AS MEASURE TESTING IS ONGOING.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains SNOMEDCT codes representing the ability to walk at least one step),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify patients who have demonstrated the ability to walk at least one step.  Using the Quality Data Model, this particular element will map to the Procedure category.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes codes representing procedure of ambulation.),(Exclusion Criteria: Does not include observable entities and findings.)

concept.display: Ambulating with assistance of one person (procedure)
Ambulating with assistance of two people (procedure)

contains.display: Ambulating with assistance of one person (procedure)
Ambulating with assistance of two people (procedure)
